question.title: How to suppress the "Deprecated member 'A' is still used" warning using a @SuppressWarning annotation in Java?
question.body:
What value should I use to suppress this warning in IntellijIdea?

I have searched through JSL documentation, multiple sites and similar questions on StackOverFlow - nothing changed. I understand that I can use "all" but I don't wanna do it.

@SuppressWarnings(value = {"deprecation"})
@Deprecated
class A {
}

public class Main {
    @SuppressWarnings(value = {"deprecation"})
    public static void main(String[] arguments) {
        A a = new A();
    }
}

I want to suppress warning, which appears exactly in class A. Could u help me?
